data.title: Alexandre Pato made to pick between Playboy or religion at AC Milan
meta_keywords: Alexandre Pato made to pick between Playboy or religion at AC Milan
data.meta_description: Alexandre Pato might have struggled to make an impression on the Premier League.But the former Chelsea striker was, at one stage, one of the hottest youngsters in the game.The Brazilian arrived at AC
data.text:
Alexandre Pato might have struggled to make an impression on the Premier League.

But the former Chelsea striker was, at one stage, one of the hottest youngsters in the game.

The Brazilian arrived at AC Milan in 2007 â€“ as a fresh faced 17-year-old.

And, according to Italian football expert Tancredi Palmeri, was faced with an immediate choice.

Between Playboy and religion.

The Duck was speaking to Fox Basil about his time with the Rossoneri.

And, judging some his past misdemeanours, it's fair to say he opted for Ronaldinho's 'Playboy' route.

The former Blues star's first marriage (to Sthefany Brito) lasted less than 10 months and the pair split due to Pato's 'constant partying'

He also had a brief dalliance with Miss Brazil Debora Lyra in 2010.

Then between 2010 and 2013, Pato was dating non-other than Barbara Berlusconi, daughter of AC Milan owner Silvio.

But, of course, that didn't last and he was then linked with Albanian model and actress Almeda Abazi.

And, according to reports, the now-Villarreal forward is dating Brazilian actress model and TV presenter Fiorella Mattheis, as Dream Team has 'reported' in the past.

But who's the real winner?
